title: XDAO.APP
author: XDAO.APP
created_time: September 06, 2023, 08:57:14 AMLast edit: September 12, 2023, 05:54:00 AM by XDAO.APP
content: XDAO is an open-source based framework on 35+ blockchains for creating non-custodial Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs). $55m+ funds raised through XDAO26k+ DAOs created 2 years of smart contracts in operation2 security auditsTWITTERTELEGRAMDISCORD$XDAO on UniSwapXDAO capabilities: - Flexibly customize governance in XDAO - Raise investment in XDAO via free crowdfunding module - Free ChatGPT product support - Interoperate with all DeFi protocols via WalletConnect- Pay salaries and dividends with a single transactionImmediate Goals:Q3-4 2023: Launch of DEXDAO - marketplace for organizations blockchain token tradingQ4 2023: Launch of a new Launchpad with vesting schedule and the ability to sell any tokensQ4 2023: Launch of a business subscription for $XDAO tokensQ1 2024: Launch of a legal framework for signing articles of incorporation and documents via DAO and enforceable in international courts$XDAO Token:A single token for the entire XDAO ecosystem. The $XDAO token will be used in all DAO-related products of the XDAO team1. XDAO2. DEXDAO3. Future secret product (launch in Q2 2024)- Used to subscribe to premium features- Used to purchase additional modules in XDAO- Will be used in the near future as payment for listings on DEXDAO- Will be used in the near future to purchase document templates for XDAOIn the next 2 years, XDAO will move to full decentralized management of the protocol via $XDAO tokens.

comments.author: the rise
comments.body: the information about XDAO is quite interesting and good, the funds collected through XDAO are very large, of course this is a trustworthy project, don't you want to do promotion in this forum sir to attract more users?

comments.author: XDAO.APP

The XDAO team is focused on creating socially useful open source solutions. We are interested in finding new partners and promoting. Write to DM!
